snippet.title: EVERSPACE 2 | Wrath of the Ancients — Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The Ancients have awakened! Their wrath has laid waste to human settlements in Cluster 34, and the path of destruction leads to the Okkar Homeworlds. Take flight in this massive expansion DLC as the Cluster readies for war once again in EVERSPACE 2: Wrath of the Ancients, coming Spring 2025 on PC, Xbox, and PlayStation.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2873470
Find it on GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/everspace_2_wrath_of_the_ancients
Get ready on Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/everspace-2-wrath-of-the-ancients/9n1ln379mj7f

Follow us on: 
https://www.facebook.com/everspace.game
https://bsky.app/profile/everspace.game
https://twitter.com/everspace_game 
https://www.instagram.com/everspace_game/
https://www.reddit.com/r/EverspaceGame/ 
http://discord.gg/rockfishgames

Music used in and officially licensed for the trailer through positionmusic.com: "Tetra" by Brandon Lau, and "Axis" by Caleb Hannan.
